title: Birdi Pharmacy
description:
Say hello to Birdi, your fast and friendly digital drug store. With low drug prices, free and flexible delivery options, and expert help when you need it – Birdi makes getting your prescriptions a breeze. 

With the Birdi app, you can:
- Manage your prescriptions in one place
- Easily scan your Rx label to transfer it to Birdi
- Order your Rx in seconds
- Track your free Rx delivery
- Securely message your Birdi pharmacist
- Get refill and new Rx reminders

Easy transfer.
Send us your prescription, or ask your prescriber to, and we’ll tell you when we get it. 

Free delivery.
We have free standard delivery or rush options. You choose.

No surprises.
We’ll tell you as soon as your prescription is shipped and delivered. Easy.

No insurance or prescription not covered? 
We’re here to help. We now offer a discount on certain prescriptions with the Birdi Price. This is one way we’re helping to make medications more affordable and accessible.

At Birdi, we are working to create the best online pharmacy experience and would love your feedback. Contact us at mobiledev@birdirx.com or 855-247-3479.

Love the app? Rate us!

www.birdirx.com
